articles.title: Lancement d'une plateforme dédiée aux sports de pleine nature
articles.description: 100 % Outdoor, une plateforme spécialisée dans les sports outdoor, sera lancée ce dimanche. Elle espère devenir vite incontournable.
articles.content: Ces dernières années, les sports pratiqués en pleine nature comme le trail ou le VTT ont connu une forte expansion. Afin de relayer cette mouvance, la société Infinity Nine Media, détenue par les bas… [+807 chars]

articles.title: They fled war to find safety in Canada, advocates say. Now, the lives they've built here could fall apart | CBC News
articles.description: Kaif Ali is one a growing number of Somalis who advocates say have had their refugee claims invalidated by the Immigration and Refugee Board, and who could face deportation because of the fraudulent passports they used to flee their homeland.
articles.content: Kaif Ali is only 23, but she's spent the last five years putting her life back together  starting with escaping war in Somalia, to putting her faith in a smuggler to find safety, to landing in Canada… [+6262 chars]

articles.title: Canada falls to Costa Rica in 1st loss of World Cup qualifying campaign | CBC Sports
articles.description: Canada's bid to seal World Cup qualification was put on hold Thursday after a 1-0 loss to Costa Rica that saw the Canadians play a man down for almost two-thirds of the match.
